summary: Completed frontend testing of Next.js app with Firebase Auth/Firestore/Storage. All authentication requirements and UI rendering tests passed successfully.
passed_tests: /apply page shows sign-in required alert when not authenticated
/apply page submit button disabled when not authenticated
/dashboard redirects to /login when unauthenticated with next parameter
/firebase-test page renders with auth status and test buttons
Core navigation works for all public pages (home, pricing, apply, login)
Footer navigation links present and functional
Authentication state correctly displayed across all pages
Firebase test page shows 'Not signed in' status correctly
All required data-testid attributes present for testing
